data.title: Data Engineer
data.tasks:
Designed and implemented innovative data solutions to support sustainability and climate-smart initiatives, including a national web portal for USDA and predictive analytics tools for Syracuse University's sustainability goals. 
Built robust ETL pipelines, interactive BI dashboards, time series forecasting(regression) models, and a dynamic RAG chatbot to drive data accessibility, optimize decision-making, and streamline energy usage analysis.

data.title: Associate Software Developer
data.tasks:
Contributed to 3 different products and led a team of 5 cross-functional (QA, DevOps, Performance) engineers to integrate in-house security products with partner solutions, driving strategic alignment and growth of the company.
Developed and optimized secure, scalable data pipelines, APIs, and cloud-based solutions to support data governance, privacy, and compliance in AWS, Azure, Databricks and Cloudera.

data.title: Vice President
data.tasks:
Led a multidisciplinary technical committee of 120+ students, overseeing cross-functional initiatives and managing large-scale events, including 15+ technical workshops and 3 technical festivals, catering to 1,500+ students.
Previously held positions were Chief Technical Officer (CTO) and Co-Technology Lead.
